title: VK API JSON Schema - methods
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API - methods

methods.name: photos.confirmTag
methods.description: Confirms a tag on a photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

parameters.name: tag_id
parameters.description: Tag ID.

methods.name: photos.copy
methods.description: Allows to copy a photo to the "Saved photos" album

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: photo's owner ID

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: photo ID

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: for private photos

methods.name: photos.createAlbum
methods.description: Creates an empty photo album.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Album title.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community in which the album will be created.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Album description.

methods.name: photos.createComment
methods.description: Adds a new comment on the photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Comment text.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: (Required if 'message' is not set.) List of objects attached to the post, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' - Type of media attachment: 'photo' - photo, 'video' - video, 'audio' - audio, 'doc' - document, '<owner_id>' - Media attachment owner ID. '<media_id>' - Media attachment ID. Example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614"

parameters.name: from_group
parameters.description: '1' - to post a comment from the community

methods.name: photos.delete
methods.description: Deletes a photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

methods.name: photos.deleteAlbum
methods.description: Deletes a photo album belonging to the current user.

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: Album ID.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the album.

methods.name: photos.deleteComment
methods.description: Deletes a comment on the photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Comment ID.

response.description: Returns 1 if request has been processed successfully, 0 if the comment is not found

methods.name: photos.edit
methods.description: Edits the caption of a photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

parameters.name: caption
parameters.description: New caption for the photo. If this parameter is not set, it is considered to be equal to an empty string.

methods.name: photos.editAlbum
methods.description: Edits information about a photo album.

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: ID of the photo album to be edited.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: New album title.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: New album description.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the album.

methods.name: photos.editComment
methods.description: Edits a comment on a photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Comment ID.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: New text of the comment.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: (Required if 'message' is not set.) List of objects attached to the post, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' - Type of media attachment: 'photo' - photo, 'video' - video, 'audio' - audio, 'doc' - document, '<owner_id>' - Media attachment owner ID. '<media_id>' - Media attachment ID. Example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614"

methods.name: photos.get
methods.description: Returns a list of a user's or community's photos.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photos. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: Photo album ID. To return information about photos from service albums, use the following string values: 'profile, wall, saved'.

parameters.name: photo_ids
parameters.description: Photo IDs.

parameters.name: rev
parameters.description: Sort order: '1' - reverse chronological, '0' - chronological

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return additional 'likes', 'comments', and 'tags' fields, '0' - (default)

parameters.name: feed_type
parameters.description: Type of feed obtained in 'feed' field of the method.

parameters.name: feed
parameters.description: unixtime, that can be obtained with [vk.com/dev/newsfeed.get|newsfeed.get] method in date field to get all photos uploaded by the user on a specific day, or photos the user has been tagged on. Also, 'uid' parameter of the user the event happened with shall be specified.

parameters.name: photo_sizes
parameters.description: '1' - to return photo sizes in a [vk.com/dev/photo_sizes|special format]

methods.name: photos.getAlbums
methods.description: Returns a list of a user's or community's photo albums.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the albums.

parameters.name: album_ids
parameters.description: Album IDs.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of albums.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of albums to return.

parameters.name: need_system
parameters.description: '1' - to return system albums with negative IDs

parameters.name: need_covers
parameters.description: '1' - to return an additional 'thumb_src' field, '0' - (default)

parameters.name: photo_sizes
parameters.description: '1' - to return photo sizes in a

methods.name: photos.getAlbumsCount
methods.description: Returns the number of photo albums belonging to a user or community.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

methods.name: photos.getAll
methods.description: Returns a list of photos belonging to a user or community, in reverse chronological order.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of a user or community that owns the photos. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return detailed information about photos

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of photos. By default, '0'.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of photos to return.

parameters.name: photo_sizes
parameters.description: '1' - to return image sizes in [vk.com/dev/photo_sizes|special format].

parameters.name: no_service_albums
parameters.description: '1' - to return photos only from standard albums, '0' - to return all photos including those in service albums, e.g., 'My wall photos' (default)

parameters.name: need_hidden
parameters.description: '1' - to show information about photos being hidden from the block above the wall.

parameters.name: skip_hidden
parameters.description: '1' - not to return photos being hidden from the block above the wall. Works only with owner_id>0, no_service_albums is ignored.

methods.name: photos.getAllComments
methods.description: Returns a list of comments on a specific photo album or all albums of the user sorted in reverse chronological order.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the album(s).

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: Album ID. If the parameter is not set, comments on all of the user's albums will be returned.

parameters.name: need_likes
parameters.description: '1' - to return an additional 'likes' field, '0' - (default)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of comments. By default, '0'.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of comments to return. By default, '20'. Maximum value, '100'.

methods.name: photos.getById
methods.description: Returns information about photos by their IDs.

parameters.name: photos
parameters.description: IDs separated with a comma, that are IDs of users who posted photos and IDs of photos themselves with an underscore character between such IDs. To get information about a photo in the group album, you shall specify group ID instead of user ID. Example: "1_129207899,6492_135055734, , -20629724_271945303"

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return additional fields, '0' - (default)

parameters.name: photo_sizes
parameters.description: '1' - to return photo sizes in a

methods.name: photos.getChatUploadServer
methods.description: Returns an upload link for chat cover pictures.

parameters.name: chat_id
parameters.description: ID of the chat for which you want to upload a cover photo.

parameters.name: crop_width
parameters.description: Width (in pixels) of the photo after cropping.

methods.name: photos.getComments
methods.description: Returns a list of comments on a photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

parameters.name: need_likes
parameters.description: '1' - to return an additional 'likes' field, '0' - (default)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of comments. By default, '0'.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of comments to return.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order: 'asc' - old first, 'desc' - new first

methods.name: photos.getMarketAlbumUploadServer
methods.description: Returns the server address for market album photo upload.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

methods.name: photos.getMessagesUploadServer
methods.description: Returns the server address for photo upload in a private message for a user.

parameters.name: peer_id
parameters.description: Destination ID. "For user: 'User ID', e.g. '12345'. For chat: '2000000000' + 'Chat ID', e.g. '2000000001'. For community: '- Community ID', e.g. '-12345'. "

methods.name: photos.getNewTags
methods.description: Returns a list of photos with tags that have not been viewed.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of photos.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of photos to return.

methods.name: photos.getOwnerCoverPhotoUploadServer
methods.description: Returns the server address for owner cover upload.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of community that owns the album (if the photo will be uploaded to a community album).

parameters.name: crop_x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the left-upper corner

parameters.name: crop_y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the left-upper corner

parameters.name: crop_x2
parameters.description: X coordinate of the right-bottom corner

parameters.name: crop_y2
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the right-bottom corner

methods.name: photos.getOwnerPhotoUploadServer
methods.description: Returns an upload server address for a profile or community photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: identifier of a community or current user. "Note that community id must be negative. 'owner_id=1' - user, 'owner_id=-1' - community, "

methods.name: photos.getTags
methods.description: Returns a list of tags on a photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

methods.name: photos.getUploadServer
methods.description: Returns the server address for photo upload.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of community that owns the album (if the photo will be uploaded to a community album).

methods.name: photos.getUserPhotos
methods.description: Returns a list of photos in which a user is tagged.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of photos. By default, '0'.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of photos to return. Maximum value is 1000.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return an additional 'likes' field, '0' - (default)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order: '1' - by date the tag was added in ascending order, '0' - by date the tag was added in descending order

methods.name: photos.getWallUploadServer
methods.description: Returns the server address for photo upload onto a user's wall.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of community to whose wall the photo will be uploaded.

methods.name: photos.makeCover
methods.description: Makes a photo into an album cover.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: Album ID.

methods.name: photos.move
methods.description: Moves a photo from one album to another.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: target_album_id
parameters.description: ID of the album to which the photo will be moved.

methods.name: photos.putTag
methods.description: Adds a tag on the photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user to be tagged.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: Upper left-corner coordinate of the tagged area (as a percentage of the photo's width).

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Upper left-corner coordinate of the tagged area (as a percentage of the photo's height).

parameters.name: x2
parameters.description: Lower right-corner coordinate of the tagged area (as a percentage of the photo's width).

parameters.name: y2
parameters.description: Lower right-corner coordinate of the tagged area (as a percentage of the photo's height).

methods.name: photos.removeTag
methods.description: Removes a tag from a photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

parameters.name: tag_id
parameters.description: Tag ID.

methods.name: photos.reorderAlbums
methods.description: Reorders the album in the list of user albums.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the album.

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: Album ID.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: ID of the album before which the album in question shall be placed.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: ID of the album after which the album in question shall be placed.

methods.name: photos.reorderPhotos
methods.description: Reorders the photo in the list of photos of the user album.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: ID of the photo before which the photo in question shall be placed.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: ID of the photo after which the photo in question shall be placed.

methods.name: photos.report
methods.description: Reports (submits a complaint about) a photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for the complaint: '0' - spam, '1' - child pornography, '2' - extremism, '3' - violence, '4' - drug propaganda, '5' - adult material, '6' - insult, abuse, '8' - suicide calls

methods.name: photos.reportComment
methods.description: Reports (submits a complaint about) a comment on a photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: ID of the comment being reported.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for the complaint: '0' - spam, '1' - child pornography, '2' - extremism, '3' - violence, '4' - drug propaganda, '5' - adult material, '6' - insult, abuse

methods.name: photos.restore
methods.description: Restores a deleted photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: photo_id
parameters.description: Photo ID.

methods.name: photos.restoreComment
methods.description: Restores a deleted comment on a photo.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the photo.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: ID of the deleted comment.

response.description: Returns 1 if request has been processed successfully, 0 if the comment is not found

methods.name: photos.save
methods.description: Saves photos after successful uploading.

parameters.name: album_id
parameters.description: ID of the album to save photos to.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community to save photos to.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: Parameter returned when photos are [vk.com/dev/upload_files|uploaded to server].

parameters.name: photos_list
parameters.description: Parameter returned when photos are [vk.com/dev/upload_files|uploaded to server].

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Parameter returned when photos are [vk.com/dev/upload_files|uploaded to server].

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Geographical latitude, in degrees (from '-90' to '90').

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Geographical longitude, in degrees (from '-180' to '180').

parameters.name: caption
parameters.description: Text describing the photo. 2048 digits max.

methods.name: photos.saveMarketAlbumPhoto
methods.description: Saves market album photos after successful uploading.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: photo
parameters.description: Parameter returned when photos are [vk.com/dev/upload_files|uploaded to server].

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: Parameter returned when photos are [vk.com/dev/upload_files|uploaded to server].

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Parameter returned when photos are [vk.com/dev/upload_files|uploaded to server].

methods.name: photos.saveMessagesPhoto
methods.description: Saves a photo after being successfully uploaded. URL obtained with [vk.com/dev/photos.getMessagesUploadServer|photos.getMessagesUploadServer] method.

parameters.name: photo
parameters.description: Parameter returned when the photo is [vk.com/dev/upload_files|uploaded to the server].

methods.name: photos.saveOwnerCoverPhoto
methods.description: Saves cover photo after successful uploading.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Parameter returned when photos are [vk.com/dev/upload_files|uploaded to server].

parameters.name: photo
parameters.description: Parameter returned when photos are [vk.com/dev/upload_files|uploaded to server].

methods.name: photos.saveOwnerPhoto
methods.description: Saves a profile or community photo. Upload URL can be got with the [vk.com/dev/photos.getOwnerPhotoUploadServer|photos.getOwnerPhotoUploadServer] method.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: parameter returned after [vk.com/dev/upload_files|photo upload].

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: parameter returned after [vk.com/dev/upload_files|photo upload].

parameters.name: photo
parameters.description: parameter returned after [vk.com/dev/upload_files|photo upload].

methods.name: photos.saveWallPhoto
methods.description: Saves a photo to a user's or community's wall after being uploaded.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user on whose wall the photo will be saved.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of community on whose wall the photo will be saved.

parameters.name: photo
parameters.description: Parameter returned when the the photo is [vk.com/dev/upload_files|uploaded to the server].

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Geographical latitude, in degrees (from '-90' to '90').

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Geographical longitude, in degrees (from '-180' to '180').

parameters.name: caption
parameters.description: Text describing the photo. 2048 digits max.

methods.name: photos.search
methods.description: Returns a list of photos.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Geographical latitude, in degrees (from '-90' to '90').

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: Geographical longitude, in degrees (from '-180' to '180').

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order:

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of photos.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of photos to return.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius of search in meters (works very approximately). Available values: '10', '100', '800', '6000', '50000'.
